title: Giant club
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| Name                                           | Giant club                                           |
| :--------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Skill                                          | [Maces & Flails](/Maces_%26_Flails "Maces & Flails") |
| [Damage](/Weapon_damage "Weapon damage")       | 20                                                   |
| Accuracy                                       | -6                                                   |
| [Base delay](/Weapon_speed "Weapon speed") (%) | 16 (160%)                                            |
| [Min delay](/Minimum_delay "Minimum delay")    | 7 at skill 18                                        |
| [Hands](/Handedness "Handedness")              | 2H                                                   |
| Size                                           | Large                                                |
| Ranged?                                        | No                                                   |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| - | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A giant lump of wood.***"Therewith the gyant buckled him to fight, Inflamd with scornefull wrath and high disdaine, And lifting up his dreadful club on height, All armed with ragged snubbs and knottie graine, Him thought at first encounter to have slaine.-Edmund Spenser, \_The Faerie Queene\_, Book I. "The Legend of the Knight of the Red Crosse", Canto VIII, stanza vii, l. 55-9. 1590. |

> This weapon falls into the [Maces & Flails](/Maces_%26_Flails "Maces & Flails") category. It is a two handed weapon.

The **giant club** is an inelegant but devastating weapon, dealing massive damage, but can only be wielded by [Formicids](/Formicid "Formicid"), [Oni](/Oni "Oni"), and [Trolls](/Troll "Troll"). It uses two hands (or all four, for Formicids) and also requires a lot of skill to swing quickly. They are never found [branded](/Brand "Brand") normally, but [Okawaru](/Okawaru "Okawaru") and [Trog](/Trog "Trog") may gift you branded or [randart](/Randart "Randart") ones.

## Strategy

Although rare to find on the floor, giant clubs are very common, as [ogres](/Ogre_\(monster\) "Ogre (monster)") often carry them. It isn't surprising to see multiple giant clubs by the early Dungeon. Whether you actually want to use one is another story. Until they get enough skill, characters will suffer with slow speed and low accuracy.

Usually, if you can comfortably wield a giant club, you should upgrade to a [giant spiked club](/Giant_spiked_club "Giant spiked club") soon. The main exception to this rule would be artefact giant clubs with the [speed](/Speed_brand "Speed brand") [brand](/Brand "Brand").

| Mundane                                                                | Magical                                                                   | Artifact                                                                  | [Unrandart](/Unrandart "Unrandart") Giant Club ["Skullcrusher"](/Skullcrusher "Skullcrusher")  |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [![Giant club.png](/images/6/6b/Giant_club.png)](/File:Giant_club.png) | [![Giant club2.png](/images/d/dc/Giant_club2.png)](/File:Giant_club2.png) | [![Giant club3.png](/images/9/9c/Giant_club3.png)](/File:Giant_club3.png) | [![Urand skullcrusher.png](/images/b/bc/Urand_skullcrusher.png)](/File:Urand_skullcrusher.png) |

## History

- Prior to [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), giant clubs had a base delay of 17, reaching minimum delay at 20 skill.

| [Polearms](/Polearms "Polearms")                     | [Bardiche](/Bardiche "Bardiche") • [Demon trident](/Demon_trident "Demon trident") • [Glaive](/Glaive "Glaive") • [Halberd](/Halberd "Halberd") ([Scythe](/Scythe "Scythe")) • [Spear](/Spear "Spear") • [Trident](/Trident "Trident") • [Trishula](/Trishula "Trishula")                                                                                                                                                                                                        |

html:
Giant club

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Name Giant club
Skill Maces & Flails
Damage 20
Accuracy -6
Base delay (%) 16 (160%)
Min delay 7 at skill 18
Hands 2H
Size Large
Ranged? No
A giant lump of wood.

"Therewith the gyant buckled him to fight,
Inflamd with scornefull wrath and high disdaine,
And lifting up his dreadful club on height,
All armed with ragged snubbs and knottie graine,
Him thought at first encounter to have slaine.

-Edmund Spenser, _The Faerie Queene_, Book I. "The Legend of the Knight of the Red Crosse", Canto VIII, stanza vii, l. 55-9. 1590.

This weapon falls into the Maces & Flails category. It is a two handed weapon.

The giant club is an inelegant but devastating weapon, dealing massive damage, but can only be wielded by Formicids, Oni, and Trolls. It uses two hands (or all four, for Formicids) and also requires a lot of skill to swing quickly. They are never found branded normally, but Okawaru and Trog may gift you branded or randart ones.

Strategy

Although rare to find on the floor, giant clubs are very common, as ogres often carry them. It isn't surprising to see multiple giant clubs by the early Dungeon. Whether you actually want to use one is another story. Until they get enough skill, characters will suffer with slow speed and low accuracy.

Usually, if you can comfortably wield a giant club, you should upgrade to a giant spiked club soon. The main exception to this rule would be artefact giant clubs with the speed brand.

Mundane Magical Artifact Unrandart Giant Club
"Skullcrusher"

History

  • Prior to 0.17, giant clubs had a base delay of 17, reaching minimum delay at 20 skill.
Weapons
Axes Battleaxe • Broad axe • Executioner's axe • Hand axe • War axe
Maces & Flails Club • Demon whip • Dire flail • Eveningstar • Flail • Giant club • Giant spiked club • Great mace • Mace (Hammer) • Morningstar • Sacred scourge • Whip
Long Blades Demon blade • Double sword • Eudemon blade • Falchion • Great sword • Long sword • Scimitar • Triple sword
Polearms Bardiche • Demon trident • Glaive • Halberd (Scythe) • Spear • Trident • Trishula
Ranged Weapons Arbalest • Hand cannon • Longbow • Orcbow • Shortbow • Sling • Triple crossbow
Short Blades Dagger • Quick blade • Rapier • Short sword
Staves Lajatang • Magical staff • Quarterstaff
Throwing Boomerang • Dart • Javelin • Large rock • Stone • Throwing net
